short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kite Tab is an end-to-end business expense and reimbursement solution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Kite Tab’s Chrome extension—letting you automate expenses right within Gmail. From flight bookings to delivery bills, Kite captures expenses from your emails, including the merchant name, expense date, and amount—and even uploads your receipts! With the click of a button, your expense is ready to be added to an expense report on Kite Tab.

Kite Tab is an end-to-end business expense and reimbursement solution. Kite Tab offers businesses of all sizes full control over every spend, with expense insights available at their fingertips.

Questions? Reach out to us at help@kite.work or give us a call at 1-800-120-5483
